author: James Crump, James Crump
title: Coronavirus: Armed vigilantes use tree to barricade man in his home because of New Jersey plates
description: 'A neighbour started yelling at him and a group of people showed up and began to gather around'
content:
A group of men were forced to stay inside their home by armed residents who suspected them to have coronavirus, after seeing their car had New Jersey license plates, according to the Knox County Sheriffs Office.
The group from New Jersey had been working on … [+2017 chars]
